QuestData.Title: I'm Not Lion!
QuestData.Description:
I've hunted many exotic beasts in my day, but I've never seen a lion like the one I encountered while scouting the basin.
The beast's amber eyes locked on mine, luring me closer. I was helpless to this predator's enchanting gaze. It was only when the lion pounced did the stupor break.
I've told Hemet of this magical beast, but he laughs. I'm not lying, $n! The lion exists.
If you find the beast, bring me a trophy of your kill, and I'll reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a hunting trophy from the lion that Ellias claims to have seen in Pinerock Basin.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'll have the last laugh when Hemet sees proof that this magical lion exists!
QuestData.RewardText: So I was right! The lion with the amber eyes did exist.$b$bHere's the gold as promised. This is worth every copper. You can't put a price on proving that you're right!$b$bI'll keep this eye, but I wouldn't want the rest of our prize to go to waste. Let's eat!
